list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The road surface here is very uneven.

list_definition.definition: (of work etc) not all of the same quality

list_ex_of_english: Given the scope of possible entries, the coverage is understandably uneven.
The uneven nature of this section does, however, add a certain charm.
They are designed to respond to the multiplication of regulators and their uneven development by coordinating implementation of regulation by member states.
Excellent evidence from historical linguistics supplements the uneven archaeological coverage in these areas.
Nevertheless, the corrective effects of these forces for reform have been uneven.
The sources are uneven : correspondence for the early decades is scant.
The subsequent fall in plant diversity is very uneven and step-like.
